titleStmt.title: A narrative of the extraordinary penitence of Rob. Maynard who was condemned for the murder of John Stockton ... and executed at Tyburn, May the 4th : together with the several conferences held with him in Newgate : as also a copy of the papers which he left to be published after his death / by Joseph Stevens.
titleStmt.author: Stevens, Joseph.
Maynard, Robert.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
